inputs.notes: Client reduced budget mid-month and wants recommendations to maximize conversions.

llm_raw.text: {"actions":[{"action_type":"adjust_bidding_strategy","details":{"campaign_id":"leadgen_oct","platform":"google","strategy":"target_cpa","target_cpa":15.0},"reason":"CPA is double the target; optimize for conversions within reduced budget.","confidence":0.9},{"action_type":"pause_elements","details":{"campaign_id":"leadgen_oct","platform":"google","element_type":"keywords_ads","criteria":"high_cpa_low_conversions"},"reason":"Eliminate wasted spend on underperforming elements to maximize conversions.","confidence":0.8},{"action_type":"review_targeting","details":{"campaign_id":"leadgen_oct","platform":"google","focus":"audience_demographics_interests"},"reason":"Ensure budget is spent on most relevant audiences to improve conversion rate.","confidence":0.7}],"summary":"Optimize bidding, pause underperformers, and refine targeting to maximize conversions with reduced budget."}
